name: mern-deployment-devops
description: Production-ready MERN stack with CI/CD and monitoring (Vite + React + Tailwind)

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm test" "cd client && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"

author: PLP MERN Stack Development
